name: Basketball vs Zombies
description:
Controls: 

W, A, S, D - movement

SPACE - throw

Destroy Zombies 

Each hit in the ring from the purple zone, destroys a certain number of zombies. Destroy as many of them as possible!

Buy skins

In battle you can earn zombie coins, spend them on new characters in your inventory and destroy zombies with new strength

Pass the levels

On your way you will meet difficult challenges that you are able to solve. Complete the levels, earn stars, and proceed to more difficult tasks
